contentrichtext.text: {{BLP sources|date=July 2008}} {{Infobox person |name=Vicki Hodge |birth_date={{birth date and age|1946|10|17}} |birth_place=[[London, England]] |occupation=Actress, model }} '''Vicki Hodge''' (born 17 October 1946 in [[London]]) is an [[England|English]] [[actress]] and [[Model (person)|Model]]. She has appeared in a few films, including ''Confessions of a Sex Maniac'' (1974), as well as appearing in the TV series ''[[Hazell (TV series)|Hazell]]''. ==Life and career== Hodge is the daughter of Sir John Rowland Hodge, ([[Hodge Baronets]]) 2nd [[Baronet]] of [[Chipstead]], [[Kent]] and his second wife Joan. She went to the Legat School of Russian Ballet, when it was at Finchcocks, [[Goudhurst]], [[Kent]]. She then attended The Lucie Clayton School of Modelling and was photographed by [[David Bailey (photographer)|David Bailey]], amongst others. From 1968 to 1981, Hodge was the girlfriend of [[Fulham]] gangster and sometime actor [[John Bindon]].<ref>Interviewed in documentary about Bindon: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8-d5hps2DYo</ref> She is also a former girlfriend of [[Prince Andrew, Duke of York]], and wrote a 'kiss-and-tell' after their affair in the [[News of the World]].<ref>[http://www.timesonline.co.uk/tol/comment/obituaries/article5518008.ece The Times | UK News, World News and Opinion<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref><ref>[http://www.dailymail.co.uk/debate/columnists/article-346322/Jodies-aunt-meets-Waterloo.html Jodie's aunt meets her Waterloo | Mail Online<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> She is the sister of Wendy Kidd (nÃ©e Hodge); [[Jodie Kidd]] and [[Jemma Wellesley, Countess of Mornington|Jemma Kidd]] are her nieces. ==Footnotes== {{Reflist}} ==External links== *{{IMDB name|0388116}} {{Use dmy dates|date=August 2010}} {{Persondata | NAME =Hodge, Vicky | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION =English actress and model | DATE OF BIRTH =17 October 1946 | PLACE OF BIRTH =[[London, England]] | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Hodge, Vicky}} [[Category:1946 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:English female models]]
